content: ** ** sale ** ------------------------------------- ** pattern can be easily modified for baby size just decreasing number of stitches you need only 1 2 skein of alpacana lanoso and 3 5 mm of 5 double pointed knitting needles you can use circular needles as well you are welcome to follow me on **facebook** https //www facebook com/groups/crazyhands net/ **instagram** https //www instagram com/amurushka_amur/ last time i got many questions about **fur pom pom** please follow link where you can buy it http //crazyhands net/shop/
